summary: UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul PEX file remover
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple VBScript that will remove the required PEX files listed in the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url] installation instructions.




[b][u][color=#ff7700]Requirements:
[/color][/u][/b]
This is a utility for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]. UFO is a requirement of course.

[b][u][color=#ff7700]FAQ:
[/color][/u][/b]
[color=#00ff00]Q: How do I install the file?
[/color]
[color=#ffff00]A: Simply download with the NMM. You can also install manually and extract it to wherever.
[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Q: How do I run the file?
[/color]
[color=#ffff00]A: Simply run the .vbs file. This is located in Skyrim\Data\UFO PEX Deleter if you use the NMM. If you manually downloaded the file, run the .vbs file from wherever you extracted it.
[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Q: It is asking for the Skyrim script location.
[/color]
[color=#ffff00]A: You don't have skyrim installed in one of the default locations or it's on some other drive. Simply copy the directory from your file explorer and paste it into the field.
[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Q: It said there were errors
[/color]
[color=#ffff00]A: Your file permissions are incorrect. Files that were moved may be set as read only. If they are not read only, you may have uncommon NTFS file permissions on your Skyrim\Data\Scripts folder. Try running the file as an administrator (Right click, run as administrator).
[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Q: Are these files backed up before they are deleted?
[/color]
[color=#ffff00]A: Yes. They will be copied to Skyrim\Data\Scripts\UFO_DisabledPEX.
[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Q: The operation completed successfully but there are no PEX files are in the folder.
[/color]
[color=#ffff00]A: This means you had none of the files in the list provided in the UFO instructions. This is normal. Carry on. [/color]
author: Jedimaster0
